summary: The implementation successfully creates the backend mutation function for batch updates, includes a migration file to insert the historical data for 2026-02-21, updates the Master_Order_Status values, and ensures the frontend dashboard and table components display the new data correctly. All 5 requirements appear to be implemented with proper validation and data flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) that performs automatic data insertion on actor upgrade
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-128 specifies 'Execute batch insertion' but does not explicitly require a migration module or automatic execution on upgrade. The requirement implies manual execution or a one-time operation, not an upgrade hook.
